0.0.0.name: Blog
0.0.0.logs:
Blogs are now make thru .md 
 removed the goofy ahh first blog

0.1.0.name: LaTeX && Change logs
0.1.0.logs:
Added change logs 
 Added LaTeX 
 Added date 
 Changed font from radio canada to Rubik

0.2.0.name: Linking blogs
0.2.0.logs:
Made blogs possible to link to each other 
 Fixed the change logs and version load incorrectly

0.3.0.name: Loading imgs and htmls
0.3.0.logs: Made imgs and htmls from inside possible to be loaded

0.4.0.name: Themes
0.4.0.logs:
Added themes, that gets applied to the whole website, expect the main page 
 Added settings, with only a select

0.4.1.name: Root dir
0.4.1.logs: Quick fix for the root dir on github being incorrect

0.4.2.name: Menus
0.4.2.logs: Removed top menu and part of the footer when a blog is open

0.4.3.name: Footer
0.4.3.logs:
Made the footer be on the bottom-left of the page and not on the bottom-left of the screen 
 Added 'Back to top' button on the bottom-rigth of the screen 
 Fix a bug that the theme select would't put the selected theme

0.4.4.name: Fucking safari ğŸ˜­
0.4.4.logs:
Fixed safari not knowing what justify-self means and using margin-left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); as a workaround 
 Fixed safari not knowing that the page scaling SHOULD ALWAYS BE 1.0 AS DEFAULT

0.5.0.name: Blog theme
0.5.0.logs:
Added blog theme 
 Better blog organization at the backend 
 Fixed change log text going out of bounds 
 Removed name as a URL param 
 Added a new amination o back to top btn (you can change it in settings at the moment of wrinting)

0.5.1.name: I love customizatoin
0.5.1.logs:
Added system theme, that updated automaticly, and set that as default 
 Added some themes, removed others 
 Fixed footer not being clickable when it was on top of blog-container 
 Fixed not being able to read a part of the change log if its to big
